HDG.IM.content: “Being” as emptiest thus embraces everything: highest generic concept, genus, ens in genere > to want to attach decisive question of metaphysics to empty word “Being” causes confusion > admit it’s empty, leave it in peace, w/ a good conscience [?]
HDG.IM.linkedContent: “Being” as emptiest thus embraces everything: highest generic concept, genus, ens in genere > to want to attach decisive question of metaphysics to empty word “Being” causes confusion > admit it’s empty, leave it in peace, w/ a good conscience [?]

HDG.BC.content: we move w/in differentiation of being & beings [good summary of ontological difference] > [“is” method] that we must continually say “is”: being wants to be put into a word, one we always mis-hear
HDG.BC.linkedContent: we move w/in differentiation of being & beings [good summary of ontological difference] > [“is” method] that we must continually say “is”: being wants to be put into a word, one we always mis-hear

HDG.QB.content: “good definition of nihilism” could be expected from discussion (Erörterung) de linea
HDG.QB.linkedContent: “good definition of nihilism” could be expected from discussion (Erörterung) de linea

HDG.QB.content: what is the Ort of the nothing? > thinking continually led around/chased around the Same as though a magical circle, w/out ever being able to approach this Same [beyond Being] > “good definition” of nihilism points us toward realm that demands a different saying (anderes Sagen) [totally other?] > if turning belongs to “Being,” so that latter resides (beruht) in former, then “Being” dissolves [auflösen] into the turning [logic of exemplarity] > [the first] X Being, initially to prevent “Being” from being a being that then stands face-to-face w/ human (Being not independent from human being) [Being needs human]

motif.name: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY
motif.title: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY

HDG.QB.linkedContent: what is the Ort of the nothing? > thinking continually led around/chased around the Same as though a magical circle, w/out ever being able to approach this Same [beyond Being] > “good definition” of nihilism points us toward realm that demands a different saying (anderes Sagen) [totally other?] > if turning belongs to “Being,” so that latter resides (beruht) in former, then “Being” dissolves [auflösen] into the turning [logic of exemplarity] > [the first] X Being, initially to prevent “Being” from being a being that then stands face-to-face w/ human (Being not independent from human being) [Being needs human]

HDG.FS.content: can man bring about all these imperatives & could he break them himself? Marxism & sociology name the “imperatives”—to which we are compelled today > Heidegger gathers then in name Ge-stell, most extreme form of history of metaphysics, of the destiny of being, from epoch of objectivity to orderability, no longer objects only “consumer goods” at disposal of every consumer [w/out objectivity, is there no more consciousness?]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: can man bring about all these imperatives & could he break them himself? Marxism & sociology name the “imperatives”—to which we are compelled today > Heidegger gathers then in name Ge-stell, most extreme form of history of metaphysics, of the destiny of being, from epoch of objectivity to orderability, no longer objects only “consumer goods” at disposal of every consumer [w/out objectivity, is there no more consciousness?]

HDG.LP.content: soul: great giver of life > everything that is alive is painful > pain is the animator (Beseelende) [cf. 180 the soul is the animator] > only the soulful fulfills destiny, capable, gifted as such, of joining in harmony the mutual bearing (wechselweisen Sichtragens) by which all living things belong > relation of fitness (Bezug des Taugens), all that lives is fit, i.e. good: good is good painfully > only true in pain > because pain is converse, kann das Lebende sein Mitanwesendes in seiner jeweiligen Art verbergend entbergen [sheltering concealment], wahr-haft [preservation/truth] sein lassen [truth as letting beings truly be what they are]

motif.name: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]
motif.title: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]

HDG.LP.linkedContent: soul: great giver of life > everything that is alive is painful > pain is the animator (Beseelende) [cf. 180 the soul is the animator] > only the soulful fulfills destiny, capable, gifted as such, of joining in harmony the mutual bearing (wechselweisen Sichtragens) by which all living things belong > relation of fitness (Bezug des Taugens), all that lives is fit, i.e. good: good is good painfully > only true in pain > because pain is converse, kann das Lebende sein Mitanwesendes in seiner jeweiligen Art verbergend entbergen [sheltering concealment], wahr-haft [preservation/truth] sein lassen [truth as letting beings truly be what they are]

HDG.EC.content: Nietzsche interpreted morality, the Platonic-Christian ethical doctrine, & its later secularized forms (rational Ethics of Enlightenment/socialism), as appearances (Erscheinungen) of will to power > Nietzsche didn’t realize that a will to power “beyond good & evil,” as realm of pure will to power, remains only counter-world (Gegenwelt) to Platonism > Nietzsche’s doctrine of “discipline and breeding (Zucht und Züchtung)” is extreme affirmation of morality > if will is evil, will to power is least of all beyond evil

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)
motif.title: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

HDG.OHF.content: for faith, man is “fallen,” his being-fallen not derived from God, but state into which man brought himself [explanation of Kant-like co-givenness of man’s goodness & his possibility of falling] > primordial experience of being-sinful (Sündigseins) at particular time: closed context of experience, basis of anthropology of Christian theology > [Nietzsche-like] God-relation (as constitutive) neutralized into consciousness of norms/values, center of acts (archē), “Ego-pole”

HDG.OHF.content: phenomenology can only be appropriated (zugeeignet) phenomenologically, i.e. through demonstration (Ausweisung), & not by repeating Grundsätze or following Schuldogmen > we’re constantly deceived about things in themselves: once the conscience of philosophy, “now a pimp (Zuhälterin) for the public whoring of the mind (öffentlichen Hurerei des Geistes), fornicatio spiritus” (Luther)
